CALCULATOR.TITLE: Calculate your trip with Arcadia
CALCULATOR.DESCRIPTION: Quickly and easily calculate your trip with Arcadia. Just enter the number of people, the country of origin and destination, the duration of the trip, and adjust the spending level for hotels, excursions, food, transportation, and other extras. Get a personalized estimated budget to help you plan your adventure with greater clarity and no surprises. Traveling with Arcadia has never been easier!

FLIGHT.TITLE: Track your flight with Arcadia
FLIGHT.DESCRIPTION: At Arcadia Travel, you can quickly and easily search for flights using the flight number, airline, or airport. Just enter the information you have and access updated details about schedules, statuses, and possible delays in real time.
